seo.title: Monterosso Camping 2025 | Campsites in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Find the best campsites near Monterosso. Budget-friendly camping options with beach access and hiking trails nearby.

body.title: Camping near Monterosso
body.subtitle: Affordable camping options near Cinque Terre's largest village. Perfect for budget travelers and outdoor enthusiasts.

features.title: Equipped Sites
features.description: Tent pitches and bungalows with electricity and water.

features.title: Beach Access
features.description: Most sites within walking distance to the coast.

features.title: Trail Connections
features.description: Direct access to Cinque Terre hiking paths.

features.title: Modern Facilities
features.description: Clean bathrooms, hot showers, and laundry services.

features.title: On-Site Services
features.description: Small shops and restaurants at larger campsites.
